task.summary: Default task

test:
* just tru to use git from android studio, hope it wont do some mess

update: Added spinner and fixed WifiReciever errors
* When user clicks 'New Record' in Localisation activity a spinner will be shown to signalise that something is happening.
* I found out that in some cases WifiReciever throws errors so I changed its deactivation and added it into onDestroy() method.

update: Updated database for records
* New column group_id was added into record table and database group_record was created. It just holds actual index of latest group_record.
* I had to change storage of text file for records because older version of android do not support path DOCUMENTS so I rerouted it into DOWNLOADS. I know that it is not the best solution but best from all others (PICTURES, MUSIC and so).

update: Updated database for records
* New column group_id was added into record table and database group_record was created. It just holds actual index of latest group_record.
* I had to change storage of text file for records because older version of android do not support path DOCUMENTS so I rerouted it into DOWNLOADS. I know that it is not the best solution but best from all others (PICTURES, MUSIC and so).

update: new RecordManager activity, icon and timestamp
* created new RecordManager activity. The activity is responsible for showing records grouped by same id. After clicking on some, the list of all records will be shown
* new icon was added in TemporaryLocalisation for RecordManager
* Timestamp has been added into search_data database

update: new listView for records
* design is just temporary and functionality too. Will be changed soon.

update: new listView for single records
* user can view any record he wants by just clicking on it. * any part of added record can be easily revealed
update: changed user interface for single record
update: new half completed black and green layout
update: next changes in layout

update: new delete activity for records
* user interface for deleting records using checkboxes with clever option 'choose all'. Row for records is also clickable.
* new RecordsDeleteManager activity was created, which handles all events
* new class RecordsDeleteAdapter was created which handles adapter layout and logic
* also new XML file for new type of row was created
update: added javadoc to RecordsDeleteAdapter
update: deleting records demo version

update: new menu items control
* when there are no records in records manager section no menu items will be shown.

update: new activities
* RenameRecord for renaming room names
* FindRecordByName for finding records

update: renaming records
* RenameRecord activity is completed
* user can rename all records with specified room name or just record with specific record it
* deleted deleting records from master localisation activity

update: search data
* search data are being selected in search activity in onCreate method and logged.
update: fixed db close problem

update: changed graphics
* New pictures and style of buttons was added * Put records into file button was temporarily moved away, but will display soon

update: changed history
* History has same UI as RecordsManager Activity including delete part. RecordsDeleteAdapter and RecordsDeleteManager works now for history too

update: big refactoring
* All adapters are in separated package called adapters
* DeleteManager works for both Records and History
* Some Activities were renamed to different names

update: new package and Activity
* record_managers package full name com.example.matmap.record_managers package was created to join all activities related with record
* Activity FindRecordsByName was finished

update: finish Neighbor creator
* NeighborCreator Activity was finished
* PathViewer Activity was created

update: finish Neighbor creator
* NeighborCreator Activity was finished
* PathViewer Activity was created

update: finish Neighbor creator
* NeighborCreator Activity was finished
* PathViewer Activity was created
update: adding missing pictures

update: finished breath-first search
* activity now show user path to selected destination

update: final refactoring
* finished java doc * changed HelpActivity and put Put changes into file button to menu bar in RecordsCreator Activity which is new name for TemporaryLocalisation

MESSAGE.value:
test:
* just tru to use git from android studio, hope it wont do some mess

update: Added spinner and fixed WifiReciever errors
* When user clicks 'New Record' in Localisation activity a spinner will be shown to signalise that something is happening.
* I found out that in some cases WifiReciever throws errors so I changed its deactivation and added it into onDestroy() method.

update: Updated database for records
* New column group_id was added into record table and database group_record was created. It just holds actual index of latest group_record.
* I had to change storage of text file for records because older version of android do not support path DOCUMENTS so I rerouted it into DOWNLOADS. I know that it is not the best solution but best from all others (PICTURES, MUSIC and so).

update: new RecordManager activity, icon and timestamp
* created new RecordManager activity. The activity is responsible for showing records grouped by same id. After clicking on some, the list of all records will be shown
* new icon was added in TemporaryLocalisation for RecordManager
* Timestamp has been added into search_data database

update: new listView for records
* design is just temporary and functionality too. Will be changed soon.

update: new listView for single records
* user can view any record he wants by just clicking on it. * any part of added record can be easily revealed
update: changed user interface for single record
update: new half completed black and green layout
update: next changes in layout

update: new delete activity for records
* user interface for deleting records using checkboxes with clever option 'choose all'. Row for records is also clickable.
* new RecordsDeleteManager activity was created, which handles all events
* new class RecordsDeleteAdapter was created which handles adapter layout and logic
* also new XML file for new type of row was created
update: added javadoc to RecordsDeleteAdapter
update: deleting records demo version

update: new menu items control
* when there are no records in records manager section no menu items will be shown.

update: new activities
* RenameRecord for renaming room names
* FindRecordByName for finding records

update: renaming records
* RenameRecord activity is completed
* user can rename all records with specified room name or just record with specific record it
* deleted deleting records from master localisation activity

update: search data
* search data are being selected in search activity in onCreate method and logged.
update: fixed db close problem

update: changed graphics
* New pictures and style of buttons was added * Put records into file button was temporarily moved away, but will display soon

update: changed history
* History has same UI as RecordsManager Activity including delete part. RecordsDeleteAdapter and RecordsDeleteManager works now for history too

update: big refactoring
* All adapters are in separated package called adapters
* DeleteManager works for both Records and History
* Some Activities were renamed to different names

update: new package and Activity
* record_managers package full name com.example.matmap.record_managers package was created to join all activities related with record
* Activity FindRecordsByName was finished

update: finish Neighbor creator
* NeighborCreator Activity was finished
* PathViewer Activity was created
update: adding missing pictures

update: finished breath-first search
* activity now show user path to selected destination

update: final refactoring
* finished java doc * changed HelpActivity and put Put changes into file button to menu bar in RecordsCreator Activity which is new name for TemporaryLocalisation
